description: Led the optimization of computer vision and recommendation systems for digital products, improving model accuracy by 25%. Collaborated closely with full-stack teams to integrate ML into production systems and drive product growth.

Built a calendar scheduling feature for Seller Central using AWS SQS, S3, and Lambda, serving 15,000+ users. Improved user engagement by 30% and reduced customer support tickets by 20% through automation and seamless integrations.
Researched and developed ML pipelines for drug discovery using KNIME and ADMET-based models, accelerating virtual screening and drug repurposing tasks by 25%.
